  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2805</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">I like to-teacher guide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ich mag Zulehrer Anleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">J'aime le guide d'à-professeur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eu gosto da guia do à-professor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gradisco la guida dell'-INSEGNANTE</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπαθώ τον οδηγό-ΔΑΣΚΑΛΩΝ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tengo gusto de la guía del a-profesor</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an oral presentation where students talk about activities they enjoy such as their hobbies and interests. Includes an assessment rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">social interation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drama</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Munddarstellung, in der
Kursteilnehmer mit Aktivitäten sich befassen, genießen sie wie ihre 
Liebhabereien und Interessen. Enthält eine Einschätzung 
Rubrik.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une présentation orale 
où les étudiants parlent des activités ils apprécient comme leurs 
passe-temps et intérêts. Inclut une rubrique d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma apresentação 
oral onde os estudantes falem sobre atividades aprecíam como seus 
passatempos e interesses. Inclui um rubric da avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per una presentazione 
orale dove gli allievi parlano delle attività godono quali i loro 
hobby ed interessi. Include una rubrica di valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια προφορική παρουσίαση 
όπου οι σπουδαστές μιλούν για τις δραστηριότητες απολαμβάνουν 
όπως τα χόμπι και τα ενδιαφέροντά τους. Περιλαμβάνει μια 
ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una presentación 
oral donde los estudiantes hablan de actividades gozan por ejemplo sus
manías e intereses. Incluye una rúbrica del gravamen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialinteration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drama</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
